Nested Class Summary
static class SchemaMappingManager.LoggingErrorHandler
          logs errors and warnings to Activity Log and rethrow exception on error and fatalError to prevent invalid documents to result in invalid SchemaMappings.

getBuiltInSchemaMapping

Parameters:
errorHandler - notified of errors/warning loading builtin schema mapping (not likely)
Returns:
